name: Pet Moto Racing ( 3D bike kids games )
name_original: Pet Moto Racing ( 3D bike kids games )
description:
Feel the thrill of racing like never before in this action-packed, heart-thumping Pet Moto racing game.

Go ahead and live out your racing dreams with Pet Moto racing game!!

FEATURES:

* Crazy addictive gameplay with ultra smooth tilt controls
* Eye popping high definition 3D graphics
* Environments that keeps changing
* Life like character animations and physics
* 8 challenging tracks
* 8 cute pet animals to pick for racing
